sub_title: Regional Category Manager & Supply Analyst SEA
summary:
I was born and raised in the Netherlands, but have always had a natural desire to explore the world. Ever since I started studying International Business I've had the dream to work and live abroad. In January 2022 this dream came true when I moved to Singapore to work in Supply Chain Management for Decathlon. Before coming to Singapore I had studied and worked for approximately a year in China and travelled to a plethora of countries, only solidifying the desire to go overseas. 
So far I've loved the sense of adventure, learning about the history, culture, and of course the incredible food(!) in Singapore. 
Another big positive for me is that I'm able to travel all over South East Asia, to experience these rich cultures & the ability to practice one of my passions year round, which is Golf. Besides Golf I'm a huge fan of Formula 1, snowboarding, spending time with my dog, friends and family & investing.

I started my career in retail mainly thanks to my upbringing. My parents used to own their own perfumes & cosmetics stores and web-shop, so it felt very natural to me. 
Working 'boots on the ground' in retail has thought me a sense of hard work, always being customer oriented, having to be pragmatic & creative, but most of all - always focusing on people first. I've learned that taking care of your teammates, making sure that they have the right tools and the right guidance and direction, will ensure the highest probability of success. Furthermore, it makes working intensely more gratifying. I've also learned, through leading multiple teams, that it is KEY to always stay authentic, straightforward and to allow yourself to be vulnerable in order to create trust. 

In my current role I've had the pleasure to be able to work with people from over 15 different nationalities. This has honed my ability to adapt and to be culturally sensitive. 
Having had the opportunity to work in Category and Supply Chain Management has opened my eyes to all the factors that make a successful value chain. Seeing all the opportunities ahead, I'm driven to use my experience in retail and commercial sense to maximize profitability.

I take care of the category 'Winter sports' for the region South East Asia & Oceania. I am based out of Singapore.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES

CATEGORY MANAGEMENT
- Writing a yearly strategy and business plan for the my sports in the region
- Selecting the most profitable offer for the region based on historical data analysis, stake holder wishes and customer feedback
- Working with merchandising to make the most efficient and commercial store layout
- Supporting on- and offline business with commercial strategies 

SUPPLY
- Reviewing yearly supply policy based on global supply context & business parameter
- Responsible for balancing the KPIs product availability and stock lifetime whilst ensuring turnover growth and margin targets
- Ensuring value creation through optimal stock management in a very complex region
- Working with our procurement team to secure our upstream supply and optimal lead times
